exam.question: This crop does not do well in soils _______ the one for which it has been specially developed.

answer.explain: 不同于； 除了…以外。句意： 这种农作物在其他土壤里都生长不好， 但这块土壤除外， 因为它是专门为该作物培育的。beyond： 远于， 超出； rather than： 而不是。

sentences.sContent: We turned off the outside lights and went to bed.
sentences.sCn: 我们关掉外头的电灯，上床睡觉了。

sentences.sContent: The house will need a lot of outside repairs before we can sell it.
sentences.sCn: 房子的外部需要好好修一修，之后我们才能把它卖出去。

sentences.sContent: ...That way they socialize over history outside the class...
...the rise of the internet has led to a declining consumption of news from outside the reader's borders...
...She decided to go outside and have a lemonade stand and make some drawings and pictures and sell them...
...The supermarkets outside the city are so much cheaper...
...A prominent reason public schools did well was that many highly qualified women had few options for worldng outside the house other than being teachers or nurses...
...The increasing number of young tourists can be attributed to their fast-growing income and their curiosity to explore the outside world...
...are more likely to think independently or at least see people outside of the economics profession as forming their peer group...
...or see them sitting outside the dean’s office...
...with people leaving candles and flowers outside Apple stores and politicians singing praises on the internet...

synos.tran: 外面的，[计]外部的；外来的

phrases.pCn: 从外侧向内侧的；从外缘向中心的

trans.tranCn: 在…的外面； 向…的外面； 除…以外

trans.tranOther: the part or surface of something that is furthest from the centre
